column2:
Humans in Toril are widespread, can be found in most regions and, in general, are fierce and disagreeable, which can sometimes lead certain other races to view them with contempt. They are renowned for their diversity and ambition, and although they lack specialization, they can excel in many areas.

§lCompatible With:§! Human, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goliath, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Half-Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Aasimar, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Elves are a long lived race of the Tel-quessir (fey) found most commonly in forests, shrublands, and other wildernesses. From time to time the elves have organized strong nations, in some cases adopting even a nomadic lifestyle. Almost all elves worship the Seldarine, otherwise known as the elven pantheon, and the elves are generally, though not always, good in nature.

§lCompatible With:§! Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Half-Gnoll, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Dwarf, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll, Orc, Tanarukk, Ogrillon

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 600 years

Half-elves, as usually defined, are humanoids born through the union of an elf and a human. Whether a half-elf is raised by their human parent or their elven parent, they often feel isolated and alone.

§lCompatible With:§! Half-Elf, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Aasimar, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 160 years

Drow, also known as dark elves, are a dark-skinned, white-haired sub-race of elves that predominantly live in the Underdark. Most drow are evil, though exceptions do exist.

§lCompatible With:§! Drow, Elf, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Half-Gnoll, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Dwarf, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 600 years

Fey'ri are generally the offspring of an elf and a fiend. Most fey'ri are the result of interbreeding between sun elves and tanar'ri in an attempt to strengthen the sun elf bloodline.

§lCompatible With:§! Fey'ri, Elf, Drow, Draegloth, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Half-Gnoll, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Dwarf, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 600 years

Halflings are humanoid creatures similar in shape to humans, but around half their size. Halflings get along well with most of the other races, and often travel between them.

§lCompatible With:§! Halfling, Dwarf, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 150 years

Dwarves are a tough, tradition-abiding folk known for their strong martial traditions and beautiful craftsmanship. Dwarf bodies are unusually tough for humanoids, they are resistant to virtually all poisons and are dense and difficult to push around. Dwarves generally live in large mountain ranges where they built kingdoms on top of magnificent works of stone.

§lCompatible With:§! Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Human, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Aasimar, Tiefling, Genasi, Hagspawn, Hag, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 350 years

Orcs are a race of humanoids that have been a threat to the other cultures of Toril, particularly Faerûn for as long as any can remember. Orcs have poor temperaments and are given to anger more easily than some races. Easily given to emotional outbursts, it often causes orcs to fly into fits of anger that gives them their violent reputation.

§lCompatible With:§! Orc, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Half-Dwarf, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Gnoll, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Ogre, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Half-orcs are humanoids born of both human and orc ancestry by a multitude of means. They are often shunned in both human and orcish society, though for different reasons.

§lCompatible With:§! Half-Orc, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Aasimar, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Goblins are a race of small and numerous goblinoids common throughout Toril. They are a nimble and elusive race, who are able to slip away from danger more easily than most.

§lCompatible With:§! Goblin, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Orc, Deep Imaskari, Genasi, Aasimar, Gith, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Tiefling, Gnoll, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Ogres are a race of giant-kin. They tend to be lazy and brutish, preferring to rely on ambush and overwhelming numbers in battle. Ogres often worked as mercenaries, hoping for easy plunder.

§lCompatible With:§! Ogre, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Minotaur, Yikarian, Gnoll, Giant, Goliath, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Half-Ogres are generally the offspring of a human and an ogre. Half-ogres were generally thought of as large, strong, and stupid among human civilizations, but considered exactly the opposite way by ogre tribes.

§lCompatible With:§! Half-Ogre, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Giant, Goliath, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Aasimar, Half-Orc, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Wemic, Centaur, Minotaur, Yikarian, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Ogrillons are generally the result of orcs and ogres breeding. Although roughly the same size as orcs and other humanoids, ogrillons are considerably stronger.

§lCompatible With:§! Ogrillon, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Half-Dwarf, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Gnoll, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Ogre, Minotaur, Yikarian, Giant, Goliath, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

A Treant is a huge, intelligent plant. They are generally chaotic good and protect the forests from those who would seek to do it harm.

§lCompatible With:§! Treant, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Hengeyokai

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Giants are humanoid creatures, usually of great strength and size. Giant characteristics are largely dependent on the type of giant. The true giants are the Cloud, Fire, Frost, Hill, Stone, and Storm giants, along with Ettins and Titans.

§lCompatible With:§! Giant, Half-Ogre, Ogrillon, Ogre, Goliath, Fiend, Celestial, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Gnoll, Aasimar, Tiefling, Genasi, Gith, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Varies

A hag is a horrible monstrous humanoid creature whose love of evil is equaled only by their ugliness. All hags are apparently female, at least in form. Due to their connection to the fey realm, they are natural users of magic.

§lCompatible With:§! Human, Fiend, Celestial, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Spirit Folk, Hagspawn, Satyr, Hengeyokai, Treant, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Giant, Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

A hagspawn is an outcast creature, the progeny of a female hag and a male human. Often abandoned at birth, they inherit the worst traits of their mothers but have a few redeeming qualities from their fathers. Hagspawn are usually big and brutish, with long muscular forearms and hands but yet having a hunched posture and red glowing eyes.

§lCompatible With:§! Human, Fiend, Celestial, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Spirit Folk, Hag, Satyr, Hengeyokai, Treant, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Giant, Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

The yikarians (or yakfolk) are ogre-sized humanoids. Their heads resembled those of a yak and their bodies were covered in coarse fur. One of their most feared abilities is the ability to possess the bodies of others. Their society was built on slavery and most are neutral evil.

§lCompatible With:§! Yikarian, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Ogrillon, Minotaur, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§MAccess to targetted decsions:§! Mind Control

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

The yuan-ti are a species of serpentine creatures who come in many forms. The purebloods are the most widespread, and are capable of reproducing with humans. They are broadly human in appearance themselves, but often have noticeable reptilian traits such as greener skin, fangs, or forked tongues.

§lCompatible With:§! Yuan-ti Pureblood, Sarrukh, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Yuan-ti Malison, Yuan-ti Abomination, Naga, Lizardfolk, Dragonborn, Lamia, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

The yuan-ti are a species of serpentine creatures who come in many forms. The malisons are overtly snake-like in part, often having ophidian heads, scaly skin, and sometimes tails. They are physically strong, but lack the social capability of the purebloods.

§lCompatible With:§! Yuan-ti Malison, Sarrukh, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Abomination, Naga, Lizardfolk, Dragonborn, Lamia, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

The yuan-ti are a species of serpentine creatures who come in many forms. The abominations are the largest and rarest of them, with entirely snakelike bodies and muscular, scaly arms. While unable to compete with the purebloods for subtlety or the malisons for agility, they are revered as the greater form of the yuan-ti race.

§lCompatible With:§! Yuan-ti Abomination, Yuan-ti Malison, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Sarrukh, Naga, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Centaurs are hybrid creatures with the upper bodies of muscular humans atop the entire bodies of horses. They live mainly in open plains, and are relatively unsociable to other races.

§lCompatible With:§! Centaur, Wemic, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Lamia, Human, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Aasimar, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Deep Imaskari, Gith, Spirit Folk, Drow, Elf, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 200 years

Wemics are hybrid creatures with the upper bodies of muscular humans atop the entire bodies of lions. They live mainly in tropical plains, and are relatively unsociable to other races.

§lCompatible With:§! Wemic, Tabaxi, Lamia, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Centaur, Human, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Aasimar, Tiefling, Genasi, Hagspawn, Hag, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Gith, Drow, Elf, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Lizardfolk are cold-blooded and usually dwell in swamps. Their rulers are typically larger and stronger than their subjects, but even relatively peaceable lizardfolk still like to dine on human flesh from time to time.

§lCompatible With:§! Lizardfolk, Sarrukh, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Malison, Dragonborn, Fiend, Celestial, Kobold, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Nagas are highly intelligent serpentine beings, descended from the ancient sarrukh. They prefer warm climates, but can adapt elsewhere if need be. They are secretive, and it is hard to know the malicious ones from the merely anti-social.

§lCompatible With:§! Naga, Sarrukh, Yuan-ti Abomination, Yuan-ti Malison, Lamia, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 500 years

The gith people were humans, untold millennia ago, before being enslaved by the illithids. They rose up in a great slave rebellion, and upon their victory split into mutually hostile factions which scattered to some of the most inhospitable parts of the multiverse. There they have adapted and grown in mystic prowess.

§lCompatible With:§! Gith, Elf, Fey'ri, Drow, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Tiefling, Aasimar, Genasi, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Hobgoblins are the larger, stronger, and more militarily adept cousins of the goblins. They are popular as mercenaries, and sometimes act as leaders and even rulers to tribes of goblins.

§lCompatible With:§! Hobgoblin, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Goblin, Bugbear, Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Orc, Deep Imaskari, Genasi, Aasimar, Gith, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Tiefling, Gnoll, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Bugbears are huge, hairy goblins. They are much stronger than their smaller kin, but if anything less agreeable. They keep to themselves for the most part, but are capable of awesome destruction if angered.

§lCompatible With:§! Bugbear, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Orc, Deep Imaskari, Genasi, Aasimar, Gith, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Tiefling, Gnoll, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Gnolls are a humanoid species unto themselves. Resembling bipedal hyenas, they are agile and cruel warriors, and their cruelty to their victims and captives is legendary. They gladly serve as mercenaries and vassals for other species whom they see as sufficiently ruthless, but their first loyalty is always to themselves and their fiendish deities.

§lCompatible With:§! Gnoll, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Orc, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Hagspawn, Hag, Aasimar, Genasi, Tiefling, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Tabaxi, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Born between a Gnoll and a very bold partner, half-gnolls hold much bestial strength, with only a little sacrifice to wit.

§lCompatible With:§! Half-Gnoll, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Human, Tabaxi, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Half-Giant, Half-Ogre, Aasimar, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Tengu, or kenkus as they are known in the West, are a wandering species of humanoid avians. Their flight capability is limited, but what they lack in the air they make up for on the ground with exceptional skills of disguise, concealment, and diplomacy.

§lCompatible With:§! Tengu, Aarakocra, Saurial, Pterafolk, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Tieflings are the offspring of fiends and mortals, or of mortals who have been changed by the uncanny energies of the Lower Planes. They have varied appearances, and a generally bad reputation.

§lCompatible With:§! Tiefling, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Devil is a general name given to fiends from the Lower Planes of Baator and Acheron, and sometimes Gehenna. Foremost among them are the Baatezu, the fiendish rulers of Baator.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Daemon is the name for fiends from the Lower Planes of the Gray Waste and Gehenna, and sometimes Carceri. Their leaders are the yugoloths, cynical masters of warfare and diplomacy who prolong every conflict they can in order to further their own ends.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Demons are the fiends from the depths of the Abyss, who rule that terrible place and run wild over the realms of Carceri and Pandemonium. The most terrible and numerous of them are the Tanar'ri, who have often plagued the material plane with their bloodlust.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Tanarukks are the planetouched offspring of orcs and demons. They lack the intense military discipline of orcs, but they make up for with their thrist for battle.\n\n§lCompatible With:§! Tanarukk, Human, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Half-Dwarf, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Aasimar, Genasi, Hagspawn, Hag
column3: Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari, Gnoll, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Ogre, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Dragon, Troll, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

column2:
A genasi is typically the offpsring of a genie and a humanoid, or the descendant of such a person. They are quite commonly encountered in Calimshan and Zakhara.

§lCompatible With:§! Genasi, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Aasimar, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Genies are creatures of great elemental power. The four great tribes of the genies are native to the four elemental planes, although they visit al-Toril from time to time. A fifth tribe, the Jann, though poorly regarded by their elder brethren, proudly make the wild places of the material world their home.

§lCompatible With:§! Genie, Fiend, Celestial, Human, Half-Orc, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Giant, Half-Ogre, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Deep Imaskari

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Most genies: Ageless

The dragonborn are an ancient race who mainly lived on Toril's twin world of Abeir. Only a few chosen by Bahamut remained on Toril. Dragonborn are tall and physically powerful, and have powers similar to those of the true dragons.

§lCompatible With:§! Dragonborn, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Malison, Lizardfolk, Fiend, Celestial, Saurial, Pterafolk, Dragon, Kobold, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years
A lich is an undead being created when an arcane spellcaster of great power binds their soul to an object called a phylactery in order to gain a form of immortality.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Baelnorns are generally good-aligned elven liches who have sought undeath to become the backbone of their families, seldom seen sources of magic, wise counsel, and guardianship.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Fiends are the evil denizens of the Lower Planes. The most commonly known fiends are the demons of the Abyss and the devils of Baator.

§lCompatible With:§! Fiend, Human, Half-Orc, Half-Elf, Half-Dwarf, Half-Ogre, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Gith, Tiefling, Genasi, Aasimar, Hagspawn, Hag, Deep Imaskari, Spirit Folk, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Celestial, Satyr, Hengeyokai, Treant, Centaur, Wemic, Dwarf, Giant, Ogre, Troll, Goliath, Gnome, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Tabaxi, Halfling, Minotaur, Yikarian, Sarrukh, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Malison, Yuan-ti Abomination, Lizardfolk, Naga, Lamia, Saurial, Pterafolk, Kobold, Tengu, Aarakocra, Sahuagin, Malenti, Kuo-Toa, Dragon, Dragonborn

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless
This creature is a lord of the Lower Planes, a fiend of great power whose very presence makes Toril tremble.

An archfiend is a particularly powerful fiend, usually a demon lord or an archdevil. An archfiend typically rules a layer of the Abyss or the Nine Hells. Some archfiends are worshiped as gods, while others prefer to discreetly accrue power.

Aasimar are the descendants of celestials or other beings of the Upper Planes, whose unearthly demeanour and uncanny powers make them respected, if not always trusted, in much of Faerûn.

§lCompatible With:§! Aasimar, Elf, Drow, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Orc, Ogrillon, Tanarukk, Ogre, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Satyr, Genie, Gith, Deep Imaskari, Hengeyokai, Half-Dwarf, Half-Elf, Half-Giant, Half-Gnoll, Half-Ogre, Half-Orc, Genasi, Tiefling, Hagspawn, Hag, Spirit Folk, Human, Giant, Wemic, Centaur, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 150 years

Beholders are strange otherworldly abominations, noted for their hatred of all who differ from them in even the slightest detail. Each one is a hovering orb with a single huge eye and fanged mouth, topped by ten smaller eyes on tentacles.

§lCompatible With:§! Special passive reproduction, one guaranteed pregnancy after 20 years of age, other heirs might spawn randomly

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years unless Elder Orb
Many strange monsters infest the wilds of Faerûn  and lurk in its civilised areas too!

Dragons are mighty reptilian monsters with exceptionally long lives and great intelect. Though not all dragons are evil, they all crave treasure.

§lCompatible With:§! Dragon, Fiend, Celestial, Dragonborn, Drow, Elf, Fey'ri, Draegloth, Half-Elf, Satyr, Hengeyokai, Spirit Folk, Centaur, Wemic, Dwarf, Half-Dwarf, Giant, Half-Giant, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Ogrillon, Troll, Goliath, Gnome, Gith, Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear, Gnoll, Half-Gnoll, Tabaxi, Hagspawn, Hag, Halfling, Human, Deep Imaskari, Minotaur, Yikarian, Orc, Tanarukk, Half-Orc, Sarrukh, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Malison, Yuan-ti Abomination, Lizardfolk, Naga, Lamia, Saurial, Pterafolk, Kobold, Tengu, Aarakocra, Sahuagin, Malenti, Kuo-Toa, Aasimar, Tiefling, Genasi

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

A strong and combative race, minotaurs resemble humanoid cows. Though they primarily saw other races as food, minotaurs possess an innate cunning and can put their appetites aside for greater goals.

§lCompatible With:§! Minotaur, Ogre, Half-Ogre, Ogrillon, Yikarian, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

A rare breed of reptile-folk, the saurials are not native to Toril, being brought from another plane. Due to their high-pitched voices, it is hard for other races to understand them.

This reptilian race resembles the pteradon, a cousin of the dinosaurs, and look like a leaner, tail-less lizardfolk with membranous wings between their limbs. They tend to be cruel and ruthless and distrust magic on principle.

Half-Celestials are the offspring of unions between mortal creatures and any type of celestial outsider. They usually have wings and other otherworldly features.

Sea Elves are an elven subrace that is adapted to underwater life. They are not as scholarly as land-dwelling elves, but are far more perceptive and in tune with their environments.\n\n§lUsual Lifespan:§! 600 years

Aarakocras are a race of avian humanoids who are fairly rare in Faerûn. They are peaceful creatures, and attempt to avoid fighting whenever possible.

§lCompatible With:§! Aarakocra, Tengu, Saurial, Pterafolk, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 80 years

Sahuagin are piscine humanoids with some shark-like features. They are usually hostile to most other races, and see surface dwellers as little more than food.

§lCompatible With:§! Sahuagin, Malenti, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

Malenti, or the "ugly ones", are Sahuagin changelings that only emerge when a Sea Elf and Sahuagin community draw too close. Often ostracized by both communities, they act as spies for their Sahuagin kin, who in return tolerate them.

§lCompatible With:§! Malenti, Sahuagin, Kuo-Toa, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll

§lUsual Lifespan:§! 200 years

A dragon's young is not as defenseless nor as meek as a human babe. Indeed, many an adventurer has carelessly lost their lives believing such trite. Still, they have a long way to go before they can scare a peasant mob.

A young Dragon has much to do during their young development. Leave the den typically, establish their own lair, and begin their most meagre hoard. Expect this dragon to spend a good century at work before they ever terrorize anyone.

Adult Dragon's are what many adventurers die trying to slay, eager to earn everlasting glory. The size of great houses, these draconic tyrants often establish themselves as petty rulers over vast swathes of land.

Ancient Dragons, great tyrants and despoilers of kingdoms far and wide. The doom of armies, wizened sage of histories long lost. To properly describe an Ancient Dragon is difficult, for they often shape the culture, religion, and even people of the land they rule.

Living constructs are a rare subtype of construct who combine elements of their more common kin and living creatures. They possess free will and sapience and possess various traits that mimic those of fleshy beings.

§lCompatible With:§! None, sterile

§lUsual Lifespan:§! Ageless

The lamia are a race of leonine centaurs not unlike wemics, but their nobles are almost all humanoid-serpent hybrids. They dwell in desolate places, and often plot against each other as well as against their neighbors.

§lCompatible With:§! Lamia, Sarrukh, Naga, Yuan-ti Pureblood, Yuan-ti Malison, Yuan-ti Abomination, Wemic, Centaur, Fiend, Celestial, Dragon, Troll
